languages.text: "Сговориться с двуличным змеенышем Владаймом — это одно. Но то, что после твоей вероломной выходки жалкое подобие порядка, царившее на станции, пошло псу под хвост — это уже наглость! Уж не знаю что ты натворил{mf||а}, но, помимо прочей швали, на Футфоле теперь орудует какой-то культ "жатвенников". Какой прок от твоего {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}зерна{/d}, если теперь там хозяйничают фанатики-людоеды?"

"Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"
languages.original_text: "Сговориться с двуличным змеенышем Владаймом — это одно. Но то, что после твоей вероломной выходки жалкое подобие порядка, царившее на станции, пошло псу под хвост — это уже наглость! Уж не знаю что ты натворил{mf||а}, но, помимо прочей швали, на Футфоле теперь орудует какой-то культ "жатвенников". Какой прок от твоего {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}зерна{/d}, если теперь там хозяйничают фанатики-людоеды?"

traits.locale_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your connivery has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your grain if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

What good is your grain if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

"Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

languages.text: « Non {mf|content|contente} de collaborer avec ce serpent sournois de Vladaym, vous avez fait preuve d'une insolence débridée en détruisant le semblant d'ordre qui existait dans la station ! Je ne sais pas ce que vous avez fait, mais en plus de tous les chiens galeux qui envahissent déjà Castel, un nouveau culte de "moissonneurs" fait maintenant parler de lui. À quoi servent vos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}céréales{/d} dans une station qui grouille de cannibales déments ? »
languages.original_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

traits.locale_text: « Non {mf|content|contente} de collaborer avec ce serpent sournois de Vladaym, vous avez fait preuve d'une insolence débridée en détruisant le semblant d'ordre qui existait dans la station ! Je ne sais pas ce que vous avez fait, mais en plus de tous les chiens galeux qui envahissent déjà Castel, un nouveau culte de "moissonneurs" fait maintenant parler de lui. À quoi servent vos céréales dans une station qui grouille de cannibales déments ? »

languages.text: «Si solo hubiese conspirado con esa víbora artera de Vladaym, ya sería bastante malo, ¡pero sus acciones, que han destruido los pocos retazos de orden que quedaban en la estación, son una insolencia! No sé cómo se las ha apañado, pero ahora además de los perros sarnosos que ya vivían en Paso tenemos un nuevo culto de "cosechadores". ¿De qué sirve el {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grano{/d} si la estación está llena de lunáticos caníbales?».
languages.original_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

traits.locale_text: «Si solo hubiese conspirado con esa víbora artera de Vladaym, ya sería bastante malo, ¡pero sus acciones, que han destruido los pocos retazos de orden que quedaban en la estación, son una insolencia! No sé cómo se las ha apañado, pero ahora además de los perros sarnosos que ya vivían en Paso tenemos un nuevo culto de "cosechadores". ¿De qué sirve el grano si la estación está llena de lunáticos caníbales?».

languages.text: 「あの二枚舌のヴラダイムの野郎とつるんでるってことだけでも最悪だったのにな。だが、お前の共謀のせいであのステーションの秩序モドキが全部崩壊したってのは純然たる傲慢だ！お前が何をやったかは知らんが、今じゃ、汚らしい犬どもに加えて、フットフォールに『収穫者』の新教団がうろついてるときてる。ステーションが人肉喰らいの狂信者まみれになっちまったら、お前の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}穀物{/d}が何に役に立つってんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

traits.locale_text: 「あの二枚舌のヴラダイムの野郎とつるんでるってことだけでも最悪だったのにな。だが、お前の共謀のせいであのステーションの秩序モドキが全部崩壊したってのは純然たる傲慢だ！お前が何をやったかは知らんが、今じゃ、汚らしい犬どもに加えて、フットフォールに『収穫者』の新教団がうろついてるときてる。ステーションが人肉喰らいの狂信者まみれになっちまったら、お前の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}穀物{/d}が何に役に立つってんだ？」

languages.text: “和弗拉迪姆那个两面派沆瀣一气，这已经是相当严重的恶行了，更别提你的纵容彻底摧毁了落脚港残存无几的秩序！这简直是胡作非为！我不知道你到底做了什么，但那里除了无法无天的暴民之外，还多出了一个自称什么‘收割者’的邪教。如果那座星站到处都是吃人肉的疯子，那你送过去的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}粮食{/d}还有什么意义？”
languages.original_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

traits.locale_text: “和弗拉迪姆那个两面派沆瀣一气，这已经是相当严重的恶行了，更别提你的纵容彻底摧毁了落脚港残存无几的秩序！这简直是胡作非为！我不知道你到底做了什么，但那里除了无法无天的暴民之外，还多出了一个自称什么‘收割者’的邪教。如果那座星站到处都是吃人肉的疯子，那你送过去的粮食还有什么意义？”

languages.text: "Schon allein mit dieser doppelzüngigen Schlange Vladaym zusammenzuarbeiten, wäre schlimm genug gewesen. Die reinste Unverfrorenheit ist jedoch die Tatsache, dass Eure Verschwörung jedes letzte Fünkchen so genannter Ordnung auf dieser Station zerstört hat! Ich weiß nicht, was Ihr getan habt, doch neben den unzähligen räudigen Hunden, die ohnehin schon auf Footfall leben, gibt es nun noch diesen neuen Kult der 'Ernter'. Was nutzt Euer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}Getreide{/d}, wenn es auf der Station nun von fleischfressenden Wahnsinnigen wimmelt?"
languages.original_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"

traits.locale_text: "Schon allein mit dieser doppelzüngigen Schlange Vladaym zusammenzuarbeiten, wäre schlimm genug gewesen. Die reinste Unverfrorenheit ist jedoch die Tatsache, dass Eure Verschwörung jedes letzte Fünkchen so genannter Ordnung auf dieser Station zerstört hat! Ich weiß nicht, was Ihr getan habt, doch neben den unzähligen räudigen Hunden, die ohnehin schon auf Footfall leben, gibt es nun noch diesen neuen Kult der 'Schnitter'. Was nutzt Euer Getreide, wenn es auf der Station nun von fleischfressenden Wahnsinnigen wimmelt?"

languages.text: "O iki yüzlü yılan Vladaym ile iş birliği yapmak bile yeterince kötüyken işbirlikçinin o istasyonda düzen namına ne varsa yok etmesi, tam bir küstahlık! Ne oldu bitti bilmiyorum ama Binliman'da yaşayan onca uyuz köpeğin üzerine bir de başımıza şu 'hasatçılar' denen tarikat çıktı. İstasyon ağzına kadar et yiyen delilerle dolu olduktan sonra {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}tahılı{/d} ne yapalım?"
languages.original_text: "Simply colluding with that two-faced snake Vladaym would have been bad enough. But that your conniving has destroyed any pathetic excuse for order that was on that station is pure insolence! I don't know what you did, but now, on top of every other mangy dog that lives on Footfall, there is this new cult of 'harvesters.' What good is your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusChaosFood}grain{/d} if the station is now crawling with flesh-eating lunatics?"
